summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 CHEVROLET TRAILBLAZER. WHILE DRIVING AT 40 MPH, THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS FAILED TO TURN OFF AND REMAINED ON AT ALL TIME. THE FLUID SPRAYED WATER AND PREVENTED THE CONTACT FROM SEEING WHILE DRIVING. THE FAILURE RECURRED NUMEROUS TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 04V046000 (VISIBILITY). THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 79,000.
